channel.title: [317-delta] Server isn't going online...?
channel.description:
OK, I've followed The Soul's tutorial on how to setup a private server and make it online. I used No-IP DUC, portforwarded and all that jazz... I've setup and made a private server successful work but that was a couple years ago so my memory is a bit off.. I even went into my firewall and allowed exceptions to the ports of my private server.. In my No-IP DUC I've turned the host on, I've set my env. variables up and my classpath/path, all that bull.. But still when I go on a server status checker and see if the server is online.. It says that the server is offline.. I followed the guide step-for-step, but still, close but no cigar. I can't really explain the problem that I'm having but I'm trying my best to.. Any ideas on something I may have missed? :\
[b]Edit:[/b] Also, I've set my client up to connect to my server ip (rssimilar.no-ip.info) and made the port in the client to the exact port that my server's source is using but still no cigar... What's the problem?

item.title: [317-delta] Server isn't going online...?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

are you using the IPV4 address on the portforward settings?

Read full topic
